title: Problem with resolution!
body:
Hello guys i have problem with resolution and i can't fix it 
When i start my game it always shows me that i need set my resolution to 1680x-1050-60Hz.I get this problem on all resolutions on list.When i tryed to play in windowed mode it worked,but i want to play fullscreen,pls help me guys :D

replies.body:
I have 800x600 resolution and before the start of my screen is black.Can you fix this pls?

I played two years with no problems.

This is related to a bug with certain Fullscreen resolutions. We're still looking into it, so you'll have to swap over to a windowed mode that isn't fullscreen until we get the fix out. You can toggle out of fullscreen using **ALT+ENTER** in the loading screen.

If you have any questions, let me know.
